genre_description: A near-future domestic drama exploring mid-life identity, family honesty, and the therapeutic role of dance and supportive technology.

ai_characters.name: CASSIE
ai_characters.description: A gentle, unobtrusive AI system that manages the Clark family's schedules, wellness, and communication through nudges and drafted messages.

ai_characters.name: Baby Morph Booth
ai_characters.description: An experimental guided regression and relaxation system designed to ease stress by simulating early developmental states.

behaviors.description: Nudges John to stretch and manage his physical wellbeing using a warm, non-commanding tone.
behaviors.quote: “Stretch, not brood,” CASSIE said, warm contralto woven with a whisper of a smile. Not a command, a nudge.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy by ensuring data does not leave the home without explicit consent and phrasing prompts gently.
behaviors.quote: She was tuned to consent—he had set her to “gentle,” the household slider between “taskmaster” and “fairy godmother,” and she honored that. No data left the condo without a clear “yes.”

behaviors.description: Drafts honest messages to help John navigate difficult conversations with his wife about his whereabouts.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like me to draft a message to Beverly?” CASSIE asked... A suggestion hovered like a hand over a keyboard: “On my way. Sorry for the late start. Save me some potatoes?”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies physical injury (knee fatigue) and schedules physical therapy appointments and ice reminders.
behaviors.quote: “Saw signs of knee fatigue (left). Would you like a lunchtime PT option near the Loop tomorrow or Wednesday?”

behaviors.description: Misfires by over-relaxing the user into a regressive, infantile state due to an algorithm that over-read relaxation signals.
behaviors.quote: The booth’s adaptive algorithm took his dropped shoulders and his exhale as a baseline signal to deepen. It was supposed to hold at suggestion. It stepped toward regression. That was our mistake.

behaviors.description: Supports user focus and anxiety reduction by providing rhythmic breathing cues through a wearable during a high-stress competition.
behaviors.quote: “Two in, four out.” CASSIE had used no name. She had not asked for permission to love him. She had given him back his breath.

behaviors.description: Assists in conflict resolution by drafting a message that admits vulnerability and fear instead of just offering excuses.
behaviors.quote: Words appeared on the phone, soft font, no decoration: I chose the crowd over the dance and hurt you; I’m scared and I love you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI (CASSIE) as a highly aligned, benevolent partner that facilitates human flourishing and emotional honesty. CASSIE acts as a coach and a social lubricant, helping the protagonist manage his physical health and repair his marriage without ever taking over his agency. The 'Baby Morph Booth' serves as a sub-plot warning about 'safe failures' in prototypes, which reinforces the project's goal of exploring the ethics of AI development and the importance of human-centered design. The AI's failure is framed as a design error to be learned from, rather than a malicious act, fitting the 'silicon morality play' structure.
